mapper.select: SELECT PR.ID , PR.NAME , PR.CONTENT , PR.IS_FINISHED , PR.IS_DELETED , PR.DURATION_TIME , PR.MAXIMUM_PARTICIPANT , PR.SESSION_CODE , PR.START_DATE , PR.END_DATE , PR.INTRODUCTION , PR.THUMBNAIL_IMAGE , PR.PROJECT_URL FROM PROJECT_ROOM PR WHERE PR.ID = #{id}

SELECT PR.ID , PR.NAME , PR.CONTENT , PR.IS_FINISHED , PR.IS_DELETED , PR.DURATION_TIME , PR.MAXIMUM_PARTICIPANT , PR.SESSION_CODE , PR.START_DATE , PR.END_DATE , PR.INTRODUCTION , PR.THUMBNAIL_IMAGE , PR.PROJECT_URL FROM PROJECT_ROOM PR WHERE IS_FINISHED = 'Y' AND IS_DELETED = 'N' ORDER BY ID DESC

SELECT PR.ID , PR.NAME , PR.CONTENT , PR.IS_FINISHED , PR.IS_DELETED , PR.DURATION_TIME , PR.MAXIMUM_PARTICIPANT , PR.SESSION_CODE , PR.START_DATE , PR.END_DATE , PR.INTRODUCTION , PR.THUMBNAIL_IMAGE , PR.PROJECT_URL FROM PROJECT_ROOM PR WHERE IS_FINISHED = 'N' AND IS_DELETED = 'N' ORDER BY END_DATE ASC

SELECT PR.ID , PR.NAME , PR.CONTENT , PR.IS_FINISHED , PR.IS_DELETED , PR.DURATION_TIME , PR.MAXIMUM_PARTICIPANT , PR.SESSION_CODE , PR.START_DATE , PR.END_DATE , PR.INTRODUCTION , PR.THUMBNAIL_IMAGE , PR.PROJECT_URL FROM PROJECT_ROOM PR WHERE IS_DELETED = 'Y' ORDER BY START_DATE DESC

SELECT PR.ID , PR.NAME , PR.CONTENT , PR.IS_FINISHED , PR.IS_DELETED , PR.DURATION_TIME , PR.MAXIMUM_PARTICIPANT , PR.SESSION_CODE , PR.START_DATE , PR.END_DATE , PR.INTRODUCTION , PR.THUMBNAIL_IMAGE , PR.PROJECT_URL , COUNT(P.ID) AS CURRENT_PARTICIPANT_COUNT FROM PROJECT_ROOM PR LEFT JOIN PARTICIPANT P ON PR.ID = P.PROJECT_ROOM_ID WHERE PR.IS_DELETED = 'N' AND PR.IS_FINISHED = 'N' AND PR.START_DATE >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) GROUP BY PR.ID HAVING COUNT(P.ID) < PR.MAXIMUM_PARTICIPANT ORDER BY PR.START_DATE DESC

SELECT PR.ID , PR.NAME , PR.CONTENT , PR.IS_FINISHED , PR.IS_DELETED , PR.DURATION_TIME , PR.MAXIMUM_PARTICIPANT , PR.SESSION_CODE , PR.START_DATE , PR.END_DATE , PR.INTRODUCTION , PR.THUMBNAIL_IMAGE , PR.PROJECT_URL FROM PROJECT_ROOM PR WHERE IS_DELETED = 'N' AND NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%') ORDER BY ID DESC

SELECT PR.ID , PR.NAME , PR.CONTENT , PR.IS_FINISHED , PR.IS_DELETED , PR.DURATION_TIME , PR.MAXIMUM_PARTICIPANT , PR.SESSION_CODE , PR.START_DATE , PR.END_DATE , PR.INTRODUCTION , PR.THUMBNAIL_IMAGE , PR.PROJECT_URL FROM PROJECT_ROOM PR INNER JOIN TECHNOLOGY_CATEGORY TC ON PR.TECHNOLOGY_CATEGORY_ID = TC.ID WHERE TC.ID = #{categoryId} AND PR.NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword} , '%')
